name: Orangewood Labs
headline: Orangewood Labs makes worlds most affordable and easiest AI robot arms
description: Orangewood Labs makes the world's most affordable AI-powered industrial robotic arms for small businesses! Our robots can be programmed by just using natural language prompts and cost a fraction of human labor.

founders.name: Abhinav Das, Founder
founders.description: Builder of Robots, Trucks and other Machines!

### Democratizing Robots
[Orangewood builds AI-powered robotic arms that are simple to operate. We make collaborative robots safe, affordable, and capable of coping with modern-day manufacturing challenges.](http://www.orangewood.co/<https:/mailchi.mp/orangewood.co/developer-community-signup>)[Book a Demo](http://www.orangewood.co/<https:/calendly.com/orangewood-labs/demo>)
### ROBOGPT
[Read More](http://www.orangewood.co/</robo-gpt>)
Use Cases
### BIN PICKING
Enhance efficiency by reducing manual labor and empowering workers to focus on higher-value tasks.
### VISUAL INSPECTION
Streamline processes with revolutionizing precision analysis and enhanced quality control with unparalleled accuracy.
### POWDER COATING
Achieve flawless finishes with precision and efficiency, empowering industries to elevate their coating process to new levels.
### BARTENDING BOT
Elevate productivity and safeguard human efforts with robotic prowess effortlessly retrieves objects.
### SPRAY PAINTING
Minimize hazards and unlock limitless creative expression with enhanced safety.
Trusted By Industry
At the forefront of innovation, we empower companies with a vision of collaboration, where humans and robots work together. Our daily real-time metrics keep customers informed and enhance their operations. Together, we transform industries.

generated_description:
**Orangewood Labs: Affordable AI-Powered Robotics for Small Businesses**

Founded in 2017 and hailing from San Francisco, Orangewood Labs is on a mission to democratize the world of robotics. Specifically, they're focused on creating the world's most affordable and user-friendly AI robot arms, designed for industrial applications. These robot arms can be programmed effortlessly using natural language, making advanced automation accessible even to small businesses. 

Having been nurtured in the Y Combinator Batch W18, Orangewood is a youthful company with a talented team of around 40 employees. Their innovative approach challenges the status quo in the robotics sector, significantly lowering costs compared to human labor while increasing efficiency.

### What They’re Up To:

Orangewood's robots are not just mechanical arms; they represent a shift in how we think about manufacturing and automation. With their platform, businesses can utilize these robots for a variety of applications, including:

- **Bin Picking**: Optimizing logistics and warehouse tasks by automating object retrieval.
- **Visual Inspection**: Enhancing quality control through precise analytical capabilities.
- **Powder Coating**: Streamlining production lines to achieve advanced finishing processes.
- **Bartending Bots**: Automating service in hospitality settings to boost efficiency.
- **Spray Painting**: Minimizing risks while unleashing creative ways to apply finishes.

Their systems are built for collaboration, stirring opportunities where humans and robots can work side by side effectively. 

### Community and Collaboration:

Orangewood believes in building a community around robotics. They invite developers and businesses alike to explore how their AI-powered robotic arms can enhance operations. They emphasize real-time metrics to keep their partners informed, enabling continuous improvement within client operations.

### Get Involved:

Their main offices are in San Francisco, but they also have a research and advancement office in Noida, India. Interested businesses can demo their products and even preorder their latest offerings directly on their website.

If you want to learn more or join their mission to transform industries through affordable robotics, visit [Orangewood Labs](http://www.orangewood.co).

### Conclusion:

In the landscape of robotics, Orangewood Labs is carving out a unique niche that marries affordability with advanced technology. Their commitment to making automation accessible for small businesses reflects a broader trend of innovation aimed at leveling the playing field in the manufacturing sector.
